jobDescription: Tenaska Power Services has an opening for a Data/Business Analyst. The position will report to the Settlements Manager and is expected to collaborate with, and in some cases support, a number of key staff including Energy Managers, Energy Originators, and Accounting staff. This position will have an active role in updating, as well as creating, logic to validate energy settlement charge types across multiple energy markets.
